questions_and_answers.subject: ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler
questions_and_answers.question: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler custom node repository?
questions_and_answers.answer: The purpose is to implement Zheng et al.'s Trajectory Consistency Distillation based on the tcd project.

questions_and_answers.subject: ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler
questions_and_answers.question: Which nodes does the custom node repository add?
questions_and_answers.answer: It adds TCDScheduler, SamplerTCD Euler A, and SamplerTCD nodes to the Custom Sampler category.

questions_and_answers.subject: ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler
questions_and_answers.question: How can you start using the custom nodes?
questions_and_answers.answer: You can start using them by cloning the repository into your custom_nodes folder and restarting ComfyUI.

questions_and_answers.subject: SamplerTCD
questions_and_answers.question: Is SamplerTCD fully functional?
questions_and_answers.answer: No, SamplerTCD is a work in progress (WIP) and currently only operates as DDIM with no gamma parameter.

questions_and_answers.subject: SamplerTCD Euler A
questions_and_answers.question: What is recommended to use instead of SamplerTCD?
questions_and_answers.answer: It is recommended to use SamplerTCD Euler A for the time being.

questions_and_answers.subject: LCMScheduler
questions_and_answers.question: What is the special parameter of LCMScheduler and what does it control?
questions_and_answers.answer: The special parameter is 'gamma', which controls the stochasticity in every step.

questions_and_answers.subject: LCMScheduler
questions_and_answers.question: What does the gamma parameter represent when set to 0 and 1?
questions_and_answers.answer: When gamma is set to 0, it represents deterministic sampling, and when set to 1, it indicates full stochastic sampling.

questions_and_answers.subject: LCMScheduler
questions_and_answers.question: What is the default value of the gamma parameter?

questions_and_answers.subject: LCMScheduler
questions_and_answers.question: What is recommended when increasing the number of inference steps?
questions_and_answers.answer: It is recommended to use a higher value for the gamma parameter when increasing the number of inference steps.

questions_and_answers.subject: ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler
questions_and_answers.question: Who helped with converting from sigmas to timestep and SamplerTCDEulerA?
questions_and_answers.answer: @laksjdjf helped with converting from sigmas to timestep and SamplerTCDEulerA.

questions_and_answers.subject: ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler
questions_and_answers.question: Where can I learn more about samplers and schedulers?
questions_and_answers.answer: For learning more about samplers and schedulers, you can check the article at https://www.felixsanz.dev/articles/complete-guide-to-samplers-in-stable-diffusion.
